      • updateProgress

        public void updateProgress(int iteration,
                           double best)
        Updates elements of the GUI to reflect current progress of the search. Thread safe.
        Parameters:
        iteration - current iteration
        best - evaluation of the best found solution.

      • foundNewBest

        public void foundNewBest(double best)
        Updates elements of the GUI to reflect the discovery of new best event. Thread safe.
        Parameters:
        best - evaluation of the best solution found so far

      • updateStatusText

        public void updateStatusText(double best)
        Updates status text. Can be acessed only from the GUI thread.
        Parameters:
